author: James T. Areddy
title: Former Anbang Chairman Expresses Remorse at Fraud Trial
text:
SHANGHAI—Wu Xiaohui, who built a small insurer into China’s third-largest and a global dealmaker, asked for leniency in court to charges he falsified financial reports to exaggerate business assets and mask benefits to himself.
At the conclusion to his one-day trial, Mr. Wu expressed remorse and indicated he understood the charges against him relating to his former position as chairman of Anbang Insurance Group Co., according to a summary published by the Shanghai No. 1 Intermediate People’s Court.
